short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate the web content to Andalûh EPA as you browse

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browse the internet in Andalûh (EPA)

With Andaluh for Web Browser you can now read in Andalûh the newspapers, your social media or interact with the public bodies in Andalûh. 

Just select your preferences, Êttandâ pal Andalûh or Zezeo, Seseo, Heheo, and press the button. This extension will save your preferences for all websites, so next time you visit the website it will be automatically translated from Spanish to Andalûh EPA.

You still learning how to write Andalûh EPA? No problem: double clic on input forms and your spanish text will be automatically translated as well.
